Google Glass

While Google Glass may not have survived as a consumer product, the industrial use of Augmented Reality is taking off. Boeing has partnered with Upskill using Glass to solve the problem of wiring new aircraft. Glass allows technicians to view wiring diagrams or watch videos of correct installations. It can also allow users to live-stream their view to more experienced workers when they run into trouble. This has decreased the time it takes to wire an aircraft by 25% and reduced errors below 1%. This is one small sample showing the potential Augmented Reality has to change how we work.

Boeing, Upskill, Google Glass
